subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Milan Lucic scored twice and David Krejci added a goal and two assists for the Boston Bruins, who beat the Toronto Maple Leafs, 6-3, for their 12th win in 13 games.
snippet: Milan Lucic scored twice and David Krejci added a goal and two assists for the Boston Bruins, who beat the Toronto Maple Leafs, 6-3, for their 12th win in 13 games.
